verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhu yadi govinde bolāilā
purīre namaskāra kari' uṭhiyā calilā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yadi—when; govinde bolāilā—called for Govinda; purīre—to Paramānanda Purī; namaskāra kari'-offering respect; uṭhiyā calilā—got up and began to go away.
translation: After saying this, the Lord called for Govinda. Offering obeisances to Paramānanda Purī, He got up and began to leave.
